# üõ∞Ô∏è GeoAI RTS Mapping Challenge Dataset

The **GeoAI RTS Mapping Challenge** dataset is adapted from **Yang *et al.* (2023)** and focuses on detecting and mapping **retrogressive thaw slumps (RTS)** across the Arctic.  
This dataset has been **extended and reformatted** to support **instance segmentation** for the competition.

> üåç **Why it matters**: RTS are sensitive indicators of **permafrost thaw**, which releases greenhouse gases and alters Arctic landscapes. By leveraging AI, we aim to accelerate RTS detection and improve understanding of climate-driven change.

## üó∫Ô∏è Geographic Coverage

The dataset spans **7 Arctic subregions**, including:

- Canada
    - Herschel Island (41 RTS samples)
    - Horton Delta (43)
    - Tuktoyaktuk peninsulas (165)
    - Banks Island (174)
- Russia
    - Yamal and Gydan peninsulas (399)
    - Lena River (7)
    - Kolguev Island (26)


![Dataset Coverage Map](assets/dataset_coverage_map.png)  
*Figure 1. Spatial distribution of RTS samples across Arctic regions.*

## üõ∞Ô∏è Data Sources & Modalities

This dataset integrates **multi-source satellite and geospatial data**:

| **Data Type**       | **Source**         | **Resolution** | **Description** |
|--------------------|-------------------|---------------|-----------------|
| RGB Imagery        | Maxar             | 4 m           | maxarR, maxarG, maxarB |
| Multi-spectral     | Sentinel-2        | 10 m          | NDVI, NDWI, NIR |
| Elevation          | ArcticDEM         | 2 m           | relative elevation, shaded relief |

## üè∑Ô∏è Annotation Types & Task Definition

Originally, **Yang *et al.* (2023)** provided **semantic segmentation masks** - binary labels indicating RTS vs. non-RTS regions.  

For this challenge, we **converted the dataset into instance segmentation format** so each RTS feature is labeled **individually**.

## üìä Dataset Statistics

| **Property**          | **Description**                                |
|----------------------|----------------------------------------------|
| **Total Regions**    | 7 Arctic subregions |
| **Total RTS Instances** | 965 annotated polygons |
| **Imagery Resolution** | Maxar 4 m, Sentinel-2 10 m, ArcticDEM 2 m |
| **Spectral Bands**   | RGB + Sentinel-2 bands (NDVI, NDWI, NIR) + DEM |
| **Task**             | Instance segmentation |
| **Labels**           | Per-instance RTS masks |
| **File Formats**     | GeoTIFF images + COCO-style annotations |
| **Original Source**  | Yang et al. (2023), *Remote Sensing of Environment* |
